spec_data.Name: php-pdo
spec_data.Description:
The php-pdo package contains a dynamic shared object that will add
a database access abstraction layer to PHP.  This module provides
a common interface for accessing MySQL, PostgreSQL or other
databases.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 22 Nov 2017 03:08:40 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A database access abstraction module for PHP applications
